name: Menghuan Shuiguo Pan: 777 Casino
description: Menghuan Shuiguo Pan: 777 Casino is a casino simulator where you choose whether you are a boy or girl and must walk around town from your hotel playing various casino games like slots and blackjack. You must buy tokens so each game can be played to make your fortune. The main town is viewed from a elevated angle. The game is a one or two player game.

shot.caption: Goddamn. Landing in Macau is always so soothing. No matter how many times I go there every year, it always feels fresh and new.
This actually reminds me of my grandpa's old car...
These dudes don't look oriental at all. Should have uploaded my face instead.
Chinese community is a bit bigger than that but ok.
I remember my buddy losing his mind at the casinos...
Hot girls were a huge part of it.
But gaming was his number one vice.
He particularly loved card games. They were almost his RUIN though.
